hero.name: Iqbolshoh
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Full-Stack developer-i ba ishtiyoq az Samarqand. Bo tajribai 3+ sola dar Laravel, React va Node.js, hal-hoi raqamii muosir va samaranok mesozam.

about.title: Dar borai man
about.subtitle: Man kist?
about.description: Nomi man Iqbolshoh Ilhomjonov, donishjui kursi 3-umi muhandisii narmafzor dar Donishgohi Davlatii Samarqand. Man dar full-stack development takhassos dorm va hal kardani masalaho-i haqiqii bo kod-ro dust dorm.
about.subDescription: Dar Tojikiston tavallud shuda, dar Samarqand buzurg shuda. Ba omukhtani doimi emon dorm va rohi khudro bo arzishho va intizomi islomii mutobiq mesozam.
highlights: Tamarkuz ba texnologiya va innovatsiyai akhlaqii
about.journeyDescription: Rohe, ki maro ba injо ovard
about.mentoringDesc: Komak ba developerho-i khurd dar rushd va omukhtani mahoratho-i nav
about.openSourceDesc: Sahm dar jamiyati developerho tавассути loyihaho-i umumii
about.ethicalTechDesc: Sakhtan texnologiyae, ki ba insoniуat khidmat mekunad va bo arzishho-i man mutobiq ast

portfolio.title: Portfolio-i man
portfolio.description: Majmuai loyihaho, ki mahoratho-i maro dar full-stack development nishon medihad, az saytho-i soda то platformaho-i murakkabi SaaS.
portfolio.letsDiscuss: Loyihai badii khudro muhokima kunem va onro amali sozem

services.title: Khidmatho-i man
services.description: Khidmatho-i kasobiyi web development baroi zinda kardani fikrho-i shuma. Az konsepsiya то joygirii, hama chizro qamr mekunam.
services.webDevDesc: Sakhtan saytho-i javobgar, panelho-i admin va sistemaho-i full-stack bo Laravel va React.
services.frontendDesc: Tarrohi UI-i muosir va pixel-perfect bo Tailwind CSS va tartibho-i javobgar.
services.backendDesc: API-ho-i bехатар va qobili vasea bo Laravel, JWT authentication va bazaho-i malumoti MySQL.
services.wordPressDesc: Saytho va mavzuho-i maxsusi WordPress baroi biznes va blogho-i khurd.
services.mentorshipDesc: Jalasaho-i mentorlik-i 1-ba-1 baroi developerho-i mubtadii dar web development.
services.provenProcess: Jarayoni isbotshudai man baroi natijaho-i ajoyib
services.discoveryDesc: Fahm kardani talabotho, maqsadho va auditoriyai maqsadnoki shuma
services.planningDesc: Sakhtan naqshai mufassali loyiha va memoriyi texnikii
services.developmentDesc: Sakhtan halli shuma bo kodi toza, qobili vasea va qobili nigahdorii
services.deliveryDesc: Sinov, joygirii va дастгириии doimi baroi таъмини muvaffaqiyat
services.letsDiscuss: Loyihai khudro muhokima kunem va tasavvuri khudro zinda sozem

contact.title: Biyo hamkori kunem
contact.description: Loyiha dar nazar dorid yo faqat Salom guftan mekhohid? Man az shumo shunidam khursand meshavam. Biyo chizi ajoyib sozem.
contact.subject: Mavzu
contact.getInTouchDesc: Man hamеsha az kor bar loyihaho-i nav va hamkori bo odamho-i ajoyib khursand meshavam. Agar loyiha dar nazar dorid yo faqat gap zadan mekhohid, bemalol murojaat kunid!
contact.quickResponseDesc: Man odatan ba hama darhostho dar 24 soat javob medaham. Baroi loyihaho-i fawrii bemalol zang zanid yo mustaqiman payom firistid.
contact.basedInDesc: Dar shahri tarikhi Samarqand, Uzbekiston joygir. Baroi kori durdast dar sarosari jahon va mulоqotho-i mahallii dar Samarqand mavjud.

blog.title: Blog-i man
blog.description: Taqsim kardani chize, ki meomuzam, mesozam va bor mekunam. Az rahnamoho-i texnikii то maslahatho-i karyera va fikrho-i shakhsii dar borai rohi developer.
blog.stayUpdatedDesc: Vaqte ki maqolaho-i nav dar borai web development, maslahatho-i karyera va маълумоти texnikii nashr mekunam, огоh shavid.
blog.noSpam: Spam nest, dar har vaqt obunaro bekor karda metavonid.
blog.exploringAspects: Tadqiq kardani jihatho-i gуногуni texnologiya va development

common.technologiesILove: Texnologiyahoe, ki bo onho kor kardanro dust dorm
common.readyToStart: Baroi shuru kardani loyihai khud tayyor?
common.workTogether: Biyo hamkori kunem, то fikrho-i khudro zinda sozem
